text: Roseline Dragomir peeks out from her hiding place behind the altar, searching for the man who led her wedding guests to slaughter.
Name: Book 26

text: From the moment she had been presented to him, she saw evil in her suitors eyes.
Name: Book 26

text: His stance was firm, overbearing, and far too possessive for a casual introduction.
Name: Book 26

text: His skin was frightfully pale, his smile leering as if she were a meal to savor.
Name: Book 26

text: Shed tried to warn her father against Vladimir Enescues marriage proposal, but he was blinded by Vladimirs vast wealth, a castle, and a bloodline to rival any in Romania.
Name: Book 26

text: All her father got, in return, was a sword through his chest.
Name: Book 26

text: Roselines gaze darts about the room, flitting high over the lifeless faces that stare at the ceiling.
Name: Book 26

text: She dares not focus on any of them for fear of her nerve crumbling entirely.

text: Her fourteen-year-old sister, Adela, trembles in her arms.

text: Blood and soot smudge the freckles from her heart-shaped face.

text: Roseline must remain strong for her.

text: Vladimirs older brother, Lucien, blocks their only exit.

text: His maniacal gaze sweeps the aisles, searching for survivors.

text: Spunky, he mutters, noting how his nephew stiffens.

text: My name is Sorin Funar.

text: Without a sound, the two guards vanish into the shadows and Sorin heads back down the hall without another word.

text: How much do you know about your girlfriend.

text: He returns to the conversation at hand.

text: The only thing I know about Rose, apart from what Nicolae has briefly told me, is from the times that Ive spent with her at school.

text: Strength or not, Sorin Funar is obviously a skilled killer.

text: Now that Ive got your attention, Sorins voice rumbles as he rises to his feet, Id like to show you a bit of our history to convince the halfwit about his precious Roseline.

text: The girl you know as Rose was born Roseline Dragomir, an English name given after her mothers side of the family, I believe.

text: See how it all began.

text: Roseline is left with questions that refuse answers and only the memory of a man she vows to hunt and kill.

text: But to do so, she must call a truce with her sworn enemy.
Name: Book 26

text: Together, Roseline and Nicolae track Fane to the underbelly of London, in search of Gabriels kidnappers.
Name: Book 26

text: But when Malachian immortal with mystifying originpresents himself as their guide, Roseline discovers she is not the only one looking for Gabriel.

text: Buried within the secret chambers of the infamous Hellfire Club, Roseline discovers a grim truth: Gabriel isnt just a pawn being used by the Arotas prophecy, and those who seek to control its power.
Name: Book 26

text: Emotions flare, friendships sever, and the newly formed bonds between enemies are tested as she delves into realms hardly conceived.

text: Author Amy Miles has always been a bit of a dreamer.
Name: Book 26

text: Growing up as an only child, and a military brat to boot, she spent countless hours escaping into the pages of a book, only to spend the following days creating a new idea of how to twist up the story to make it unique.
Name: Book 26

text: Since becoming a mother, Amy has slowly nourished her love of the written word while snatching writing time in the midst of soiled diapers, tumbling over Legos and peering around mounds of laundry and dishes that never seem to go away.
Name: Book 26

text: Once her only son started school, Amy was free to let her fingers dive into dark mythology, tales of betrayal and love, and explore human nature in its rawest form.
Name: Book 26

text: Her love of seeing the world from a different angle bloomed.
Name: Book 26

text: Amy is the author of several novels, including her popular young adult immortal books, The Arotas Series, which are an Amazon and iBooks bestselling series.
Name: Book 26

text: Unwilling to be defined by any one genre, she proceeded to flip over to a science fiction/fantasy based idea with her Rising Trilogy.
Name: Book 26

text: She then dove into contemporary romance with her novel, Captivate and explored the depths of her own faith with In Your Embrace.
Name: Book 26

text: She is currently working on completing her Immortal Rose trilogy, a prequel to her Arotas novels.
Name: Book 26

text: She has also embarked on two new journeys this year, one in the form of a co-written banshee trilogy, The Hallowed Realms, which is currently represented by GH Literary and she breached another genre with her upcoming adult horror novel, Wither.
Name: Book 26
